english.title: We Have Cookies!
english.text: We have a few cookies- Please take a moment to decide wether you wanna to keep em all or not.
english.table1_row1_column2: Determins wether to show the light or dark user interface.
english.table1_row2_column2: Determins in which language text should be displayed.
english.table1_row3_column2: Determins wether cookies already have been chosen.

german.title: We Have Cookies!
german.text: We have a few cookies- Please take a moment to decide wether you wanna to keep em all or not.
german.table1_row1_column2: Determins wether to show the light or dark user interface.
german.table1_row2_column2: Determins in which language text should be displayed.
german.table1_row3_column2: Determins wether cookies already have been chosen.
